channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [CXF-1751] idl2wsdl fails to generate wsdl for IDL files with complex object reference usage
item.description:

item.summary: idl2wsdl fails to generate wsdl for IDL files with complex object reference usage

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Patch attached.

Apply from trunk with: patch -p0 < complex_obj_ref_idl.diff
